text: Initial inspection completed. Minor roof damage due to wind. Photos attached. Awaiting contractor estimate.
overall-summary: Initial inspection completed; minor wind-related roof damage with photos, awaiting contractor estimate.
customer-facing-summary: We completed the initial inspection and noted minor roof damage. We are waiting on a contractor estimate and will update you soon.
adjuster-facing-summary: Inspection done; minor wind damage confirmed with photos. Awaiting contractor estimate to proceed.
recommended-next-step: Request and review the contractor estimate, then finalize scope and settlement.

text: All documentation received. Coverage confirmed. Approved for reimbursement. Customer notified via email.
overall-summary: Documentation complete, coverage confirmed, reimbursement approved, customer notified.
customer-facing-summary: Your documents are complete and coverage is confirmed. Reimbursement is approved and you have been notified by email.
adjuster-facing-summary: Docs verified; coverage confirmed. Claim approved and customer notified via email.
recommended-next-step: Initiate reimbursement payment and close the claim after confirmation.

text: Damage predates policy effective date. Claim denied. Formal denial letter generated and mailed.
overall-summary: Claim denied because damage predates policy effective date; denial letter sent.
customer-facing-summary: We determined the damage occurred before your policy started, so the claim was denied. A formal letter has been mailed to you.
adjuster-facing-summary: Loss predates coverage; claim denied. Denial letter generated and mailed.
recommended-next-step: Log denial documentation and monitor for any appeal or additional evidence.

text: Waiting on repair receipts and police report. Follow-up scheduled for next week.
overall-summary: Awaiting repair receipts and police report; follow-up scheduled next week.
customer-facing-summary: We are waiting for your repair receipts and police report. We will follow up next week.
adjuster-facing-summary: Pending receipts and police report; follow-up set for next week.
recommended-next-step: Contact claimant to obtain missing documents and proceed with evaluation.
